1.0.name: wordpress/page-management
1.0.description:
Page Management is a plugin that allows a sites' pages to be managed easily. "Page Management" allows admin users to:

  • Reorder pages using "drag and drop".
  • Choose the number of pages that the author can see at the same time so that the author can see all the site's pages at the same time.
  • Allow authors to hide subpages so they can see the pages more easily.
  • Creates an option to change the default view "Uploaded to this Post" in the media manager (making pictures/photos/images easier to find).
  • Creates an option to add a shortcode dropdown to Tiny MCE (so you can select your site's shortcodes from a dropdown).

Page Management has more great options:

  • You can choose to hide subpages by default (so you can see the main pages of your site).
  • Remove pagination from the pages/posts editing pages - so you can see all the posts or pages at the same time. This makes reordering the pages using the "drag and dr
